messages.title: Pippa's action plan for South East Cambs
messages.content: Pippa is winning widespread support for her positive plan for South East Cambs. Pippa is different. She isn't a career politician. She's in this fight to deliver real change for people living in every corner of our community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pippa will do whatever it takes to put an end to Brexit and keep Britain open, tolerant and prosperous.
Climate expert Pippa will push for bold action to protect and enhance our environment.
Pippa will lift our schools and hospitals up to ensure all residents, have access to first-class healthcare and education.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The 3rd and 4th parties can't win in South East Cambs

issues.brexitEurope: Pippa will do whatever it takes to put an end to Brexit and keep Britain open, tolerant and prosperous.
issues.education: Pippa will lift our schools up to ensure all residents have access to first-class education.
issues.environment: Climate expert Pippa will push for bold action to protect and enhance our environment.
issues.health: Pippa will lift our hospitals up to ensure all residents have access to first-class healthcare.

leaflet.personalStatement: Pippa is different. She isn't a career politician. She's in this fight to deliver real change for people living in every corner of our community.

images.caption: Pippa's campaign is picking up support from every corner of South East Cambridgeshire.
The strong voice our area needs to defend our shared values.
